There were no other sightings in Ellicott City on or around January 14th 2012
Summary: outside 2 smoke looked left spotted 4 ufos to close to be planes..
divs: Sighting Detailssunday night at work pine orchard sunoco..10214 baltimore national pike.. ellicott city maryland...stepped outside to smoke... looking to my left north east 45 degrees left of route 40...noticed 3 large red and orange light in the sky..also noticed 1 large whitelight just to the right and above other3 ufos...the white light very bright sat still...the first3 light flashing very bright red and orange..these 3 ufos were moving closer together...almost comming together as one..they seperatedback and forth like this for about 15 to 20 minutes..a couple of times they moved away looked like they were out of my sight very small..then they came back..this lasted for about 23 minutes total time then they disappeared ..just like me or you turning off a light switch...i felt no ill effects or time loss...my only reaction was darn the one day i left my camera at home....these objects were not jetliners or regular typeairplains there were a couple of planes in the area..these ojects were 10 to15 times bigger than a jet..
